decoworld.editor.map

Class TileSetWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.editor.map.TileSetWrapper

  • public final class TileSetWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper to keep a TileSet and its Pixmap[] together.

                                               throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Get the Pixmap associated with the Tile with the specified ID.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of the TileSet. This is a convenience function, it is identical to getTileSet().getName().
        Returns:
        The name of the TileSet.

      • getTileCount

        public int getTileCount()
        Get the number of Tiles in the TileSet. This is a convenience function, it is identical to getTileSet().getTileCount().
        Returns:
        The number of Tiles in the TileSet.

      • getTile

        public decoworld.model.world.map.Tile getTile(int id)

        Get the Tile with the specified id. This is a convenience function, it is identical to getTileSet().getTile().
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Tile.
        Returns:
        The Tile with the specified id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
